meanings.definition: A Mediterranean sauce made of garlic, olive oil, and egg yolks.
meanings.sent1: I love to dip my fries in aioli.
meanings.sent2: The aioli added a delicious flavor to the sandwich.
meanings.sent3: The garlic in the aioli was so strong, it could ward off vampires!
meanings.sent4: The aioli was a creamy garlic dream on my plate.
meanings.sent5: The aioli was as smooth as silk and as flavorful as a garden of herbs.

meanings.definition: A mayonnaise-like sauce flavored with garlic.
meanings.sent1: The aioli on the salad was a tasty surprise.
meanings.sent2: She spread the aioli on her sandwich for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The aioli was so good, it could make cardboard taste delicious!
meanings.sent4: The aioli was a garlicky cloud floating over the dish.
meanings.sent5: The aioli was like a burst of garlic sunshine on my taste buds.
